decks.notes: The key concept of this deck is to ramp up mana quickly using cards like Amulet of Vigor, Arboreal Grazer, and Dryad of the Ilysian Grove in order to play Primeval Titan and search for powerful lands like The One Ring, Urza's Saga, and Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle. By utilizing bounce lands and utility lands, the deck aims to generate multiple land drops per turn and maximize its mana production to assemble a winning board state with lands that generate additional value or enable game-winning combos.

This deck focuses on aggressive plays with a combination of disruption and efficient creatures. It utilizes powerful cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Dauthi Voidwalker to pressure the opponent while disrupting their hand with cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push. The deck also includes strong finishers like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger to close out games. With a mix of removal, disruption, and strong threats, this Rakdos Aggro deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure victories in the Modern 1 vs 1 format.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize creatures as tools for creating combos. The deck includes a variety of creatures with unique abilities that can be used in combination with Chord of Calling to search for specific creatures in the deck. Grist, the Hunger Tide, Yawgmoth, Thran Physician, and Agatha's Soul Cauldron play key roles in generating value and creating opportunities to assemble powerful combinations. The deck also includes land cards and support spells to help facilitate these interactions and maintain board control throughout the game.

The deck focuses on utilizing Indomitable Creativity to quickly cheat out powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty, while also disrupting opponents with cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Leyline Binding. The combination of fast mana generation from lands like Dwarven Mine and efficient removal spells like Prismatic Ending and Lightning Bolt allow for a swift and aggressive playstyle. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with big threats and disruption, while also utilizing the graveyard recursion of Wrenn and Six to maintain card advantage and board control.

This deck focuses on playing aggressively and efficiently with low-cost creatures and instant-speed removal spells. The key strategy is to control the board early game with Leyline of the Guildpact and Lightning Bolt, while quickly developing a threatening board presence with Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Scion of Draco. Leyline Binding and Subtlety are used to disrupt opponent's game plan and protect your own creatures. The deck also includes card filtering and selection tools like Mishra's Bauble and Expressive Iteration to ensure consistent draws and maximize your chances of winning battles quickly.

This aggro deck focuses on utilizing a wide range of low-cost, aggressive creatures and powerful spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and deal consistent damage. The key strategy involves playing efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, Nishoba Brawler, and Scion of Draco, while also utilizing removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Stubborn Denial to control the board. Additionally, the deck includes a range of land cards to support the multi-colored nature of the deck, allowing for consistent access to a variety of spells and creatures to maintain pressure on the opponent.

This deck focuses on quickly casting low-cost spells to control the board and deal damage efficiently. By utilizing cards like Lightning Bolt, Counterspell, and Dragon's Rage Channeler, the deck aims to keep the opponent on the defensive while building up a threatening board presence with creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer. The deck also includes cards like Underworld Breach and Mishra's Bauble to maintain card advantage and dig for key pieces. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive tempo while disrupting their game plan.

This Mono Black Control deck focuses on disruption and removal, using cards like Inquisition of Kozilek, Thoughtseize, Fatal Push, and Sheoldred's Edict to control the opponent's board. The deck also utilizes ramp with Cabal Coffers and Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth to generate a lot of mana. March of Wretched Sorrow and Profane Tutor help find key cards, while Karn, the Great Creator provides additional utility. The deck has a toolbox approach with access to different artifacts like Demolition Field and The One Ring, while also utilizing Cling to Dust for graveyard interaction.
